1.0.0.7.name: connect20/TBT_RewardsReferral
1.0.0.7.description:
- Fixed 100 max iterations when accessing back-end bug. 
- Fixed foreign key wrong for sites with custom table prefix. 
- Fixed errors when sending referral due to bad e-mail template. 
- Changed successful referral message from "This email was successfully invited." to "Thank you!  Your referral e-mail to %s has been sent.".

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.0.8.name: connect20/TBT_RewardsReferral
1.0.0.8.description:
* [Global] Referral child ID not set if no rules exist - #0000319
* [Global] SQL Update script gives an error if table prefix exists - #0000320
* [Global] Earn on first order does not work if no signup rule exists - #0000321
- Fixed errors when sending referral due to bad e-mail template. 
- Changed successful referral message from "This email was successfully invited." to "Thank you!  Your referral e-mail to %s has been sent.".
